hanzi-su-wiki:
眺

Значения

Вглядываться; любоваться

Мнемоника

Пристально смотреть 目 на костер для гаданий 兆, стараясь найти ответы на свои вопросы. Прыгающий взгляд.
purpleculture_pinyin:
tiào
to gaze into the distance
смотреть вдаль
rtega_mnemonic:
眺眺RSlook at, gaze at, scan, survey
  • eye 目 gazing at the signs 兆
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 兆 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
眺望 [ tiào wàng ]: to survey the scene from an elevated position
远眺 [ yuǎn tiào ]: to gaze into the distance
凭眺 [ píng tiào ]: to lean on sth and gaze into the distance
临眺 [ lín tiào ]: to observe from afar; to look into the distance from a high place
遐眺 [ xiá tiào ]: to stretch one's sight as far as possible
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 兆 [ zhào ] omen; mega-, million
heisig_story: To give someone the "evil eye" is to stare at them, wishing them evil. The roots of the superstition are old and almost universal throughout the cultures of the world. In this kanji, too, being stared at is depicted as an eye that portends evil.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: stare, watch, look at, see, scrutinize
koohiiStory1: Sauron´s One fiery eye stare at Frodo and it is a sign of portent. Evil will become whomever the eye is staring upon.
koohiiStory2: You lost a staring contest with a turtle because you blinked your eye before he did. (The contest wasn´t fair, because turtles have nictitating membranes, and don´t need to blink so often.) Eye comes first, because stare is most associated with eyes. And compare with challenge (#658) where this same obstreperous turtle challenges you to a finger wrestling contest. (Sibyl´s story with some notes that helped me).
jp_example_words:
眺め(ながめ): scene, view, prospect, outlook
眺める(ながめる): view, gaze at
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When your eye catches an omen, it's only natural that you will stare at it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You don't see omens that often, so of course you're going to stare. We'll imagine what the omen is in the reading mnemonic.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you stare at the omen, you see Mrs. Chou (ちょう) knocking down buildings, putting nails on the street, and making herself way longer than you ever thought possible. Oh, and there she is, destroying the world.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Whenever you see an omen (radical), remember that the omen will probably have Mrs. Chou in it!
Ru_Meaning: stare, watch, look at, see, scrutinize
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 兆 (きざし、チョウ признак, предзнаменование). Не путать: 挑 (いどむ、チョウ бросать вызов).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your eye (目) is showing signs (兆) of watching
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " head " to the " mega " sound. "Shuowen" is based on the original meaning of looking wrong, that is, squinting. "Said Wen": "Overlooking, the eyes are not correct. From the eyes, the sound." Such as "Selected Works. Pan Anren's "Shooting the Pheasant Fu": "There are also bodies that can't look at the sight, and you can tick away from the evil view." Li Shan's commentary quoted Xu Yan as saying: "Tick away from the evil view, the vision is not right, and I am often shocked."

The common meaning of " Tiao " is to look far away and look far away. "Jade articles. Head": "Overlooking, looking down." Such as "Book of Rites. "Yue Ling": "It's the moon, don't use the fire to the south, you can be smart, you can see from a distance, you can rise to the mountains, you can be on the terrace." "Bian Le": "Confucius has a sense of ambiguity, and looks high and far away.

" Tiao " also refers to seeing and seeing. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Fu of the Southern Capital": "Weily look at it, and the eyebrows are rolled."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " head " to the " mega " sound. "Shuowen" is based on the original meaning is not correct, and the common meaning is to look far and far away.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「兆」聲。《說文》以為本義是目不正，即斜視。《說文》：「眺，目不正也。从目，兆聲。」如《文選．潘安仁〈射雉賦〉》：「亦有目不步體，邪眺旁剔。」李善注引徐爰曰：「邪眺旁剔，視曕不正，常驚愓也。」

　　「眺」的常用義是遠眺、遠望。《玉篇．目部》：「眺，眺望也。」如《禮記．月令》：「是月也，毋用火南方，可以居高明，可以遠眺望，可以升山陵，可以處臺榭。」《孔子家語．辯樂》：「孔子有所繆然思焉，有所睪然高望而遠眺。

　　「眺」也泛指看、視。如《文選．張平子〈南都賦〉》：「微眺流睇，蛾眉連卷。」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「兆」聲。《說文》以為本義是目不正，常用義是遠眺、遠望。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
眺
Pinyin: tiào
English Definition: to gaze into the distance
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 目
Pictophonetic: 兆 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
    • 兆 [ zhào ] omen; mega-, million
Step by Step Stroke Sequence: Download Customize Pin it

眺望 [ tiào wàng ]: to survey the scene from an elevated position
远眺 [ yuǎn tiào ]: to gaze into the distance
凭眺 [ píng tiào ]: to lean on sth and gaze into the distance
临眺 [ lín tiào ]: to observe from afar; to look into the distance from a high place
遐眺 [ xiá tiào ]: to stretch one's sight as far as possible

眺字的基本解释

眺
tiào
望，往远处看：眺览。眺瞩。眺望。远眺。
目不正，斜视。

眺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiào］
［《廣韻》他弔切，去嘯，透。］
(1)远望。
(2)视；看。
(3)用同“跳”。

眺字的英文翻译

◎ 眺
look into the distance from a high place

眺字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眺； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页807第07
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他弔切，音糶。【說文】目不正也。【潘岳·射雉賦】邪眺旁剔。【註】視瞻不正，常驚惕也。　又【玉篇】眺望也。【類篇】遠視也。【禮·月令】可以遠眺望。　又臺名。【三輔黃圖】影蛾池，一曰眺蟾臺。　又【集韻】【正韻】土了切【韻會】吐了切，?糶上聲。義同。　或作覜。

眺字的源字形

眺字的起名意思

古称夏历月底月亮在西方出现。现指远看。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Lunch】【Headword Department】　Tiao; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 807 to 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? He hangs and cuts, and the sound is 粜. [Said the text] The eyes are not correct. [Pan Yue·Shooting Pheasant's Fu] Evil View and tick away. [Note] Incorrect vision, often alarmed.　[Jade Chapter] Looking at it again. 【Classes】Hyperopia also. [Li·Yue Ling] You can see from a distance.　Also known as Taiwan. [Sanfu Yellow Picture] Shadow Moth Pond, one is overlooking Toad Terrace.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] soiled and cut [Yunhui] vomited and cut, and sounded. The same meaning.　Or make a view.

Look over
Name meaning
In ancient times, the moon appeared in the west at the end of the Xia calendar. Now refers to the far view.
gP 中

会意字。从目,古文字形体像眼睛,表示用眼睛远望;从兆,兆指卜兆,灼龟甲以其裂痕远(预)知将来的吉凶,表示眺
是远望。本义是眺望,即远望。

Зная слово.
Глазами древние иероглифы подобны глазам, что означает взгляд вдаль; со стороны предзнаменования, предзнаменование относится к предзнаменованию. Обжигающий панцирь черепахи знает будущее хорошее или плохое по своим трещинам, что означает, что вид находится издалека. .
Первоначальный смысл беседки, то есть дальновидный.
Взгляд вдаль: Взгляд далеко ~ | Поднимитесь высоко ~ далеко.

tiào
гл.
1) смотреть вдаль; пристально смотреть, вглядываться, всматриваться; рассматривать, наблюдать
登高远眺 взобравшись высоко, видишь далеко
2) косить глазами; смотреть искоса
邪眺 смотреть искоса
Radicals: 目, 兆  (eye, omen)
Meaning Mnemonic
When your eye catches an omen, it's only natural that you will stare at it.
You don't see omens that often, so of course you're going to stare. We'll imagine what the omen is in the reading mnemonic.
Reading Mnemonic
As you stare at the omen, you see Mrs. Chou (ちょう) knocking down buildings, putting nails on the street, and making herself way longer than you ever thought possible. Oh, and there she is, destroying the world.
Whenever you see an omen (radical), remember that the omen will probably have Mrs. Chou in it!
